body_html:
Indeed, when using '--seed 50' it works vs. the default of 543.

$ MKL_NUM_THREADS=10 OMP_NUM_THREADS=10 numactl --cpunodebind=1 --membind=1 taskset -c 20-39 perf stat ~/miniconda2/bin/python reinforce.py  --log-interval 2000 --seed 50
WARN: gym.spaces.Box autodetected dtype as <type 'numpy.float32'>. Please provide explicit dtype.
Solved! Running reward is now 195.002788788 and the last episode runs to 199 time steps!

vs

MKL_NUM_THREADS=10 OMP_NUM_THREADS=10 numactl --cpunodebind=1 --membind=1 taskset -c 20-39 perf stat ~/miniconda2/bin/python reinforce.py  --log-interval 2000 --seed 543
WARN: gym.spaces.Box autodetected dtype as <type 'numpy.float32'>. Please provide explicit dtype.
Episode 2000    Last length:     8      Average length: 8.41

body:
Indeed, when using '--seed 50' it works vs. the default of 543.

```
$ MKL_NUM_THREADS=10 OMP_NUM_THREADS=10 numactl --cpunodebind=1 --membind=1 taskset -c 20-39 perf stat ~/miniconda2/bin/python reinforce.py  --log-interval 2000 --seed 50
WARN: gym.spaces.Box autodetected dtype as <type 'numpy.float32'>. Please provide explicit dtype.
Solved! Running reward is now 195.002788788 and the last episode runs to 199 time steps!

```
vs

```
MKL_NUM_THREADS=10 OMP_NUM_THREADS=10 numactl --cpunodebind=1 --membind=1 taskset -c 20-39 perf stat ~/miniconda2/bin/python reinforce.py  --log-interval 2000 --seed 543
WARN: gym.spaces.Box autodetected dtype as <type 'numpy.float32'>. Please provide explicit dtype.
Episode 2000    Last length:     8      Average length: 8.41
```
